item.title: CVE-2024-31932|2024-04-11T12:20:29.718Z -- CreativeThemes -- Blocksy Companion
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CreativeThemes Blocksy Companion.This issue affects Blocksy Companion: from n/a through 2.0.28.
